content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (43.0, -82.0) and a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) with a Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) nearby, potentially for fuel or output storage.

### Inserter System at position (43.5, -80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5), a Chest at position (43.5, -79.5) as the drop position, and a Chest at position (44.5, -81.5) as the pickup position.

### Storage Area at positions (44.5, -81.5), (45.5, -80.5), and (43.5, -79.5)
Consists of three Chests at positions (44.5, -81.5), (45.5, -80.5), and (43.5, -79.5) for storing various items.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items into it.
- Verify that the entity from which you are trying to extract items has the items you are trying to extract.
### Errors when using Burner Mining Drill
- Ensure the Burner Mining Drill has fuel to operate.
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining when it is full.
- Ensure the chest at the drop position has space to receive the mined items.
### Errors when using Burner Inserter
- Ensure the inserter has items to pick up from the source chest.
- Empty the destination chest when it is full to allow the inserter to continue operating.
### Errors when handling full chests
- Regularly check and empty full chests to prevent operational halts in mining and inserter systems.
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that the Burner Mining Drill and other fuel-dependent entities have a sufficient fuel supply to operate continuously.
